text.3_Mitzvot Ase, 19_Mitzvah, 0_Seif: The twentieth commandment is that we're commanded to build a Beit Ha-Behira for [Divine] service, in it will be sacrifices and an eternal burning of fire and to it will be the travel and pilgrimage on the festivals and gatherings every year. This is what the Torah said "make for me a Temple."
text.3_Mitzvot Ase, 169_Mitzvah, 0_Seif: This commandment is to hear the sound of the shofar on the first day of Tishrei, as He, the prasied One said, "A day of [shofar] blasts it should be for you". The details of this Mitzvah are expounded in tractate Rosh Hashana. Women are not required to fulfill this Mitzvah.
